definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out

sentences.english: I undertake to resume studies following the expiry of the deferment period approved.
sentences.chinese: 本人會於已獲批准的延遲修業期完結後復課。

sentences.english: Hongbai Township Central Primary School, I heard, have also started classes.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說紅白鎮中心小學的孩子們也已經復課了。

sentences.english: Day of a few heads is checked, the following day stealthily resume classes.
sentences.chinese: 一些班頭天查完，第二天便悄悄復課。
